title: Slider
description: Display a nice slider with a multitude of options like the direction, autoplay, etc...

lnf.title: Look and feel
lnf.description: Specify the loop and feel of the slider

behavior.title: Behavior
behavior.description: Specify the behavior of the slider

direction.title: Direction
direction.description: Specify the direction of the slider

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Specify if you want the slider controls or not (arrows)

nav.title: Navigation
nav.description: Specify if you want the navigation (dots) or not

swipe.title: Swipe
swipe.description: Specify if you want your slider to be controlled by the user swipe or not

mousewheel.title: Mousewheel
mousewheel.description: Specify if you want your slider to be controlled by the user mousewheel or not

clickOnSlide.title: Click on slide
clickOnSlide.description: Specify if you want your slider to go to the clicked slide or not

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Specify if you want your slider to be in loop mode or not

slide.title: Slide
slide.description: Specify the first slide to display

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: Specify if you want to display a progressbar on your slider or not

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: Specify some ms between each slides

autoplay.title: Autoplay
autoplay.description: Specify if you want your slider to autoplay or not

container.title: Container
container.description: Spcify if you want to wrap the slider inside a container or not
